Package assignement2

Class User

java.lang.Object
assignement2.People
assignement2.User
public class User
extends People
The class User is used to represents user entity. This class inherit from People class.

  • Method Details

    • signIn

      public boolean signIn() throws java.io.IOException
      This method is used by the user to login into the wine store account
      Returns:
      (True - log in successfully completed, False - wrong log in)
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

    • signUp

      public void signUp​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String passwd, java.lang.String address)
      This method is used by user to signUp into the wine store.
      Parameters:
      name - is the user'name that want to be registered into the system.
      surname - is the user's name that want to be registered into the system.
      email - is the user's email that want to be registered into the system.
      passwd - is the user's password that want to be registered into the system.
      address - is the user's address that want into be registered

    • searchWine

      public Wine searchWine​(java.util.List<Wine> list)
      This method is used to search the wine into the system
      Parameters:
      list - is the list of wines
      Returns:
      (Wine - search successfully , null - search went wrong)

    • buyWine

      public void buyWine​(WineStoreSystem ws) throws java.io.IOException
      This method is used from the user to buy new bottles of a specific wine.
      Parameters:
      ws - It is the instance of Wine Store
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - None
